thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 34 of 918
thread.title: Uilson

author: Uilson
title: Uilson
text: Best prices, but I can't do more purchases. I sent a message to the support, but they only said my limit is over. I didn't even know that it was a limit to order. I wanna do more purchases, but I can't, cause of this limit. I don't know how much it is and nobody answered me if and when I would order again... I wanna buy more games, but Bundle Stars don't want to sell them.
